mapper.select: SELECT f.idFlight, f.price, f.Airlines_idAirlines, da.idAirport AS IdDepartureAirport, da.airportName, da.city, da.country, da.coordinates, aa.idAirport AS idArrivalAirport, aa.airportName AS arrivalAirportName, aa.city AS arrivalCity , aa.country AS arrivalCountry, aa.coordinates AS arrivalCoordinates FROM Flight f JOIN Airport da ON f.IdDepartureAirport = da.idAirport JOIN Airport aa ON f.idArrivalAirport = aa.idAirport WHERE f.idFlight = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Flight (price, Airlines_idAirlines, IdDepartureAirport, idArrivalAirport) VALUES (#{price}, #{start.airlines[0].id}, #{start.id}, #{finalDestination.id})
